website_summaries.verdict: A powerful package made by a conscientious company, this easy-to-use table saw is the best choice on today's market.
pros: Easy to set up and take down
cons: Pneumatic tires may become punctured at construction site

customer_reviews.title: More than just a portable table saw
customer_reviews.text: More than just a portable table saw. Solid, strong motor, and great table. It obviously has it size restrictions but everything that Bosch has engineered here is fantastic. I have used this saw to rip 4x4's for posts, 10 foot construction boards, as well as dados for drawers, end cutting on cutting boards, and more, and the only limitation is my skill to use the saw.
customer_reviews.author: h_zucker

customer_reviews.title: Received a defective returned item
customer_reviews.text: Great saw. Best jobsite saw on the market. Great price. Fast shipping. However, I received a returned item. Not cool and I had no choice but to work with it, as it is needed tomorrow. The stand and saw had been opened, partially assembled, abandoned, poorly repacked. Hardware pouch was taped together and about 30% short. The stand was also incorrectly drilled - well actually not drilled at all. Which likely explains the return in the first place. See pic. These pieces should be identically drilled, otherwise it’s impossible to assemble. Would have returned if I had an option.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Simple Set Up and Accurate Out of Box
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a Delta 10" Bench Saw which was terrible. This Bosch 4100-10 is everything I had hoped it would be. It arrived a day early. The box had a few dings, but the packaging inside is good. Set up was fairly easy. I check the 90 and 45 degree stops on the blade with a Digital Inclinometer and found it to be dead accurate on both settings out of the box. Saw runs smooth and quiet. Soft start is nice. The fold-up base is super nice and convenient. Easy to move, set-up, and put away. Cuts great with included blade. Nice saw!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SAW........BAD DUSTBAG COLLECTOR
customer_reviews.text: OVERALL I LIKE THE PRODUCT. THIS IS MY THIRD CIRCULAR SAW,SECOND PORTABLE ONE.I PURCHASED THE OPTIONAL DUST BAG.THAT WAS A MISTAKE...I DO HAVE A SHOP VAC WHICH I WILL EVENTUALLY HOOK UP TO THE SAW. DUST BAG IS VIRTUALLY USELESS. IM NOT A PROFESSIONAL WOODWORKER BUT BUILD MODEL BOATS FROM SCRATCH ERGO A LOT OF SAWDUST TO GATHER.OVERALL VERY PLEASED WITH PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Paugh

customer_reviews.title: Overall the best in class
customer_reviews.text: Overall, best one as a job site saw. Quieter than dewalt 745. I didn’t compare the accuracy. The most appreciated part is that the saw the completely calibrated before shipping. I checked the parallelism between the saw, slot, splitter, rip fence, the perpendicular of the saw, fence side with table. Almost everything is perfect setup, no extra effort. The only issue is sled bar has a play around 0.1 mm. Anything to improve? I think Bosch needs to work out the dust protection for the motor lifter. Whatever how I improve the vacuum there are always plenty of dust attached to the lifter bar and screw, soon cause it hard to move up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Zongyao Qu

customer_reviews.title: Another company gone cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Instead of charging a little more this is basically a cheap knockoff. This replaces one that I have had for 9 years. This on the lift is smaller , cheaper and has hard wheels. The older model had pneumatic wheels that required air once in a while but was really easy to move. The top one this one is very light gauge metal with a rough paint finish. The arbor is not deburred and very hard to thread nut onto arbor.The rip splitter is plastic instead of metal. Overall a very cheap version of a great saw. Sorry to see bosch sell out.
customer_reviews.author: ntex

customer_reviews.title: Blade/motor raising mechanism
customer_reviews.text: I am a general contractor specializing in cabinet installation. I purchased this saw Nov 2019. Using it for about two kitchen installs per week. This week it started to get more more difficult to raise the blade. After stripping out the hand wheel, I tried to figure out what the problem is. Discovered the motor/blade assembly rides up and down on two smooth rods. The screw that drives the assembly up and down causes the assembly to become slightly tilted and then it binds up. The only way to raise the blade is to remove the blade insert and grasp the blade and pull up while cranking... Disappointing for a saw of this caliber.
customer_reviews.author: Renita Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Elevating the blade quit working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this saw thinking it would be a lot better than my Dewalt contractors saw. I was wrong. After about 6 months the blade would not go up without fear of breaking the hand wheel. The fence scale is really hard to read. The dust collection system is terrible. The gears used to raise and lower the blade are plastic and subject to cold. A contractors saw should be able to cope with the cold temperature as the work is outside in the winter sometimes I had to send the saw in to a Bosch Repair Facility. I don't know how long that will take.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Burgwald

customer_reviews.title: Very precise
customer_reviews.text: Best portable table out there in the market. I do a lot of high end customs trim carpentry work. Doing a lot of custom column work with all types of wood. Have to rip custom trim and make a lot of adjustments between columns to make them look similar. Stand could be of a heavier gage. But over this is my second one in 10 years. Old one was still in great shape to sell and put towards this one for the most precise cuts needed for my line of work.
customer_reviews.author: William I.

customer_reviews.title: Watch out this is not a quality saw
customer_reviews.text: First saw I ordered had a bad motor/bearing making the saw noisy when operating. I ordered a replacement saw and tried to attach a table extension made by Bosch (previously installed on first saw. The screw holes on the saw were too shallow and I could not tighten the brackets. Even if there is a good price on this saw you will find that it is made with poor quality in China.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Martin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, well made tool!
customer_reviews.text: ....superior design, accurate and a pleasure to use. Took 30 mins to assemble the stand, instructions are clear and easy to understand. Unit itself easy to move around and set up. Soft start feature is nice and out of the box the blade is spot on. It is expensive but well worth the cost. AAA+++
customer_reviews.author: Richy Rich

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: What a great tool. Works flawlessly. Everything lined up right out of the box. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: The Shark

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and easy to assemble. Comes in pieces so you can bring it to where you intend to keep it before assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Direct drive works well. Fence is better than expected. Unfold with hands and foot.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. It is a direct drive saw. No belt involved. Historically direct drive saws have not been very good. This design after 4 months of usage has performed very well. The fence is much better than expected. The fold up design is very good, only issue is you need to use your foot in addition to you hands to start the unfolding when you start the setup.
customer_reviews.author: tooney

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've owned multiple table saws; this is by far above and beyond the best in terms of safety and accuracy. Setting this saw up takes a few steps but they are very worth while. Literally every single part on the saw is adjustable (if needed) although I only needed to adjust the gate tension as it came from the factory very straight and true. The gate is solid with a great weight and a very smooth slide. I love this saw.
customer_reviews.author: mark wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Great saw I would give it 5 stars but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great saw I would give it 5 stars but I actually use on job sites without dust collection so my issue is all the pockets, nooks and cranny's in the base and sub-base inside the saw collect LOTS of saw dust and make it hard to blow out.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Smith

customer_reviews.title: watch for delivery
customer_reviews.text: delivery left in the rain on the ground, positioned on its end vs. the package indicator direction. opened box, it seems to be ok. i would watch the delivery
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: First table saw
customer_reviews.text: This is my first table saw and I love this thing. Its sturdy the cuts seem to be on point and I have not had any issues with it at this point except the initial setup.
customer_reviews.author: bear

customer_reviews.title: Factory setup couldn’t be better!
customer_reviews.text: The rip blade enclosed was and is trash. A couple of teeth are so far out they leave deep scores in the cut. Blade alignment is within 0.001, terrific set up! Building fixtures and jigs for quality cuts.
customer_reviews.author: William Kay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable table saw
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Bosch 4100 I have owned. I left my first one in Wisconsin with my son falsely assuming I wouldn’t need it in Arizona. They are excellent heavy duty saws which I have used for numerous projects including cabinet making. Unfortunately, the limitations of this saw are found in a contractor saws as a result of the necessity to make them easy to load and unload from a pickup truck bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sigler

customer_reviews.title: Is all the important parts are plastic .. for the price you pay its unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: Bought in august used 30 times and already broken . The parts that raise and lower blade are jammed and the wheel is stripped. If your charging people top dollar your important parts shouldn't be plastic. Should of stayed with dewalt 5yr old table saw never had 1 problem I switched to bosch because its suppose to be geared towards contractors not homeowners to be sturdy and well built and 7 months later it's broken. Not a good look
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This saw is incredible, I waited far to long to purchase. Purchase the rear and left side supports though, they are musts for this saw. It's a little pricy but believe me, well worth it. I'm a 30 year carpenter and this is the best table saw I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the saw was just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I work in my garage and this was just what i needed. all adjustments were right on
customer_reviews.author: qsrv400

customer_reviews.title: Professional carpentry shop quality but portable!
customer_reviews.text: Professional carpentry shop quality, sturdy but portable. My husband is a construction manager and master carpenter. He bought this to re-build a garage on our lot. He is very pleased, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Table saw went together easily. I thought the box was very large, and that I wouldn't be able to get it into my basement. But when I opened the box, it was need assembly. Moving the parts down stairs was easy. Assembly was easy. Saw works great. Blade not so good. Needs a better blade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gravity rise and portability are excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the same model for one of my clients to build his workshop. For being a jobsite Table saw, I think it’s an excellent buy. The gravity rise engineering is absolutely unprecedented. There is a little bit of a wobble in the blade, ive noticed, but not enough to cause too much of problem. It’s magnificent for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Nathanial J. Steigenga

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great saw! Quality construction. Tight and accurate fence. I wish the stand was a bit heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Philip H

customer_reviews.title: Great portable table saw
customer_reviews.text: Just right for the home garage shop. Folds up nicely and stores out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Great portable saw.
customer_reviews.text: Performs as advertised. Easy to use and good value for your money. Happy with the overall performance.
customer_reviews.author: Achilles S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Bosch table saw, had the 1st one for 12 years until someone liked it more and stole it. I would recommend purchasing the out feed support and the lefside extension. Great saw!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Schomburg

customer_reviews.title: I love this saw!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool! It's powerful and portable. A great saw!
customer_reviews.author: CKS

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Husband love it. Can move it where he needs to.
customer_reviews.author: kandi isbell

customer_reviews.title: No disappointments with Bosch tools!
customer_reviews.text: Simply a great machine, this is the second one I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great saw for DIYer
customer_reviews.text: Overall has proven to be a very quality portable saw. Some people complain about the fence, which I think is perfectly adequate. Certainly more than sufficient for most of my DIY tasks
customer_reviews.author: Zach E

customer_reviews.title: Very good saw.  Sawdust collector bag needs a little more engineering
customer_reviews.text: Look at my photo-sawdust collector attached, pile of sawdust on the floor
customer_reviews.author: joepaoucejuowrn sfmo

customer_reviews.title: A nice tool
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to adjust the angle/height of blade. If the extension of the frame is longer, it will be great.
customer_reviews.author: peitsung1978

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Saw is quite. Fair instructions to assemble. Easy to move you use perfect for a DIY guy.
customer_reviews.author: JBear🍑🍑

customer_reviews.title: Superb table saw!
customer_reviews.text: Very good saw. cuts great, and we have run a lot of lumber through it already. Easy to fold up and transport/store away.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great saw right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Use this saw on a daily basis. Ultra dependable and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Smurphy

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Table Saw
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble stand. Top quality product and with versatile features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting one these for a long time. I finally bought it and have no regrets
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: over all, a lot of money for a portable saw but still glad I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Great table saw for the money
customer_reviews.text: Able to cut wider sheets accuracy of the cut it's portable and easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY L.

customer_reviews.title: Tricky wheel assembly
customer_reviews.text: The saw works great. It has a large surface for ripping large pieces. The wheel assembly was tricky. They could have coded the pieces for easier assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Russell B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Well built, works great and folds up nicely for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: I think this tool will extend my ability to work by a couple of years. This is a very fine engineered tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Great saw for the price. Quality cuts that can stand up to the bigger cabinet saws.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Old woodworkers never die, they just need lighter portable tools and equipment
customer_reviews.text: It fits all my requirements- I live in an apartment, and need to roll it outside to use it. It has the easiest lift system and very light weight The machine when mounted is very stable. It has a slow-up to speed which prevents circuit breakers from popping I used this machine back in the day, and was very pleased. With it
customer_reviews.author: Joe K.

product_meta.title: Bosch Power Tools 4100-10 Tablesaw - 10 Inch Jobsite Table Saw with 25 Inch Cutting Capacity and Portable Folding Table Stand
product_meta.description:
The Bosch 4100 10 10 In. Work site Table Saw with Gravity Rise Wheeled Stand delivers both professional rip capacity and outstanding portability for a tool that can get the job done, wherever it is. The powerful 15 Amp saw delivers 4. 0 max HP for outstanding productivity. It also incorporates soft start circuitry for smooth but quick ramp up to the operating Speed to manage the intensity of motor start up and minimize the possibility of tripping a circuit breaker. It includes constant response circuitry to help maintain Speed under load, and overload protection. The square lock rip fence is engineered for maximum trueness and great ease of use, with the fence able to easily glide along the rail for one handed operation. The lighter GTA47W gravity rise wheeled stand has 8 In. treaded rubber composite tires and a single action design for easy set up and transport. It is job site ready with heavy duty construction. The smart guard system is the first modular table saw blade guard, featuring a three position adjustable riving knife, anti kickback pawls and non obstructed view barrier guard assembly. The table saw provides a 29 In. x 21 1/2 In. square tabletop with a 25 In. rip capacity for ripping 4 Ft. wide sheets goods in half. SquareLock rip fence – engineered for enhanced clamping and trueness.

Dimensions: Table saw & stand combination in working position = 30.25" Depth (front to back) x 47" Width (when extension is at in-most position) x 35.5" Height. Table-top dimensions = 21-1/2" Depth (front to back) x 29" Width (when extension is at in-most position). Weight: 58.0lb,Weight of Bare Saw - Lb: 63.0,Weight of Saw, Standard Equipment and Stand - Lb: 92.0,Width: 32.0. Works With: Vacuum Hoses-Common 2-1/2" Vacuum Hoses,Vacuum Hose Adapter for 35 mm Vacuum Cleaner Hoses-VAC004,Dust Bag-TS1004,Zero-Clearance Insert-TS1005,Dado Insert-TS1007,Molding Insert-TS1009,Outfeed Support-TS1016,Left-Side Support-TS1008.
feature_bullets: Powerful table saw – has 15-Amp saw with 4. 0 max HP and 3, 650 rpm, for rip-cutting and cross-cutting of fine and rough materials
Dimensions: 37.7" D x 29.4" W x 19.4" H | Product Weight: 110 lb
Large cast aluminum top – provides increased work space and material support with a 30 In. ripping capacity
Soft-start circuitry – manages intensity of motor start-up and minimizes the likelihood possibility of tripping a circuit breaker
Constant Response circuitry – helps maintain speed under load
Restart protection – helps to avoid accidental startup
Portability – works seamlessly with the included lighter GTA47W Gravity-Rise Wheeled Stand for easy jobsite mobility, with single-action setup and take down
Smart Guard System – riving knife and anti-kickback pawls provide protection, while the guard assembly provides a barrier to help prevent blade contact while allowing an unobstructed view of the cut

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars233 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
